channel.title: [Epic] RuneThrive Source + Client Download! [317]
channel.description:
[center]Note: [b]The Name is a typo. Yes it is a 317, but no, its not epic. That's your opinion.[/b][/center]
I quit my own server, and decided to release it since I'm switching sources.
[center]First, off - I'm going to announce credits.[/center]
[center]..::CREDITS::..[/center]
[center]JaydenD12 - I used his base as my source. Me - for Editing Alot.[/center]
[center]..::What I changed::..[/center]
[center]I had my server online for a while (NOT ADVERTISING), and a couple of players, about 6 or 7, complained, Oh em gee you need runes for teleports -.- Oh em gee its like Rs -.-
[b]..::This is what I changed::..[/b]
Added ::Home ::Fally ::Ardougne ::Cammy ::Varrock ::Event (was for my upcoming birthday) You can change these. Moved Staffzone Added a Rares Shop for Staff. Moved all Shop Npcs to home (I think). Might be more around Fally. Changed Starter. Made some Npcs Stationary. Pkbox (I couldn't add the Wildy Zone with it...I'm not that of a Expert Coder, command is ::pkbox). Added a Public Boolean nonWild (I tried to make a Pkbox in wildy) Editted some commands. ::Staffring (Dragonstone ring is no longer the Admin Ring, Onyx Ring is with the same bonuses, 5k+ you can edit this though).
[b]..::What I did NOT Change::..[/b] Starter Place (You start at tutorial island, and talk to the Ddsspeced Guide...Wasn't able to change name, only in dialogue) Training Monsters Scattered Around Some Commands Home Area (As in Lumbridge)[/center]
Download Winrar [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]here[/url].
Download the source [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=URR4Z34T]here[/url].
Download the client [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=I0ZVS8EL]here[/url].
There are no viruses, I assure you. Winrar is from the official site, and Megaupload doesn't let virus files in.
Btw, there is one error in the Client.java, with one of the Methods, I think method348, I thought you might be able to fix that as I wasn't able to.
[center][b]..::Pictures::..[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/1.png[/img]
[img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/2.png[/img]
[img]http://i525.photobucket.com/albums/cc339/ownedlol_2008/3.png[/img] Feel free to post any questions or so.
